timeline.title: B.Tech in Computer Science Engineering – Thejus Engineering College, Thrissur, Kerala
timeline.description: Pursuing a comprehensive curriculum in Computer Science covering programming, algorithms, databases, networks, and emerging technologies. Actively involved in projects, coding communities, and collaborative learning experiences to build strong technical and problem-solving skills.

timeline.title: Tech Leader – ISTE Student Chapter
timeline.description: Leading the student chapter in campus with over 200+ active members, coordinating multiple tech events including Coding competitions and workshops, and fostering a culture of learning and innovation on campus. Successfully organized technical events and mentored junior students in their career development.

timeline.title: Developer Intern – Narrowlabs
timeline.description: Working on real-world software solutions involving frontend development, backend APIs using Python, and AWS cloud integration. Currently contributed to 3 major projects, improved application performance, and collaborated with cross-functional teams in an agile environment.

timeline.title: Tech Leader – µLearn
timeline.description: I am currently representing the µLearn tech programs on campus, where I am actively organizing tech meetups and workshops. My focus is on helping fellow students upskill by guiding them through structured learning paths and fostering a strong community network for knowledge sharing.
